description:
This is a subpart of a core MBA module (BMA5802) carrying 4 modular credits. Each subpart carrying 1 modular credit.
Part C of this module aims to equip students with consulting toolkits through using hypotheses led-thinking and project planning, structuring value creation model, use of correct visual aids to tell story and exploring 3Vs for presentation.
BMA5802 consists of 4 subparts:
- BMA5802A: Managing Business Across Culture(1MC)
- BMA5802B: Working with A Team (1MC)
- BMA5802C: Consulting Toolkit (1MC)
- BMA5802D: Solutions Delivery (1MC)
title: MBA Survival Kit
